title: The Emancipation of Mariah Carey | “Fly Away” | 3
description:
With a brand new record deal and a sizzling love affair, Mariah’s ready to strike out on her own. But now that she finally has her freedom, Mariah will learn the hard way that independence isn’t always easy.
